item.description:
Organized by Lauren Cormier of our permaculture group.....
___________________________________

Come and support the creation of Permaculture Food Gardens for Liberian Refugee children in Buduburam Refugee Camp, Ghana!

Benefit will include food, music, raffle, and slide show about the project

To learn more about the project visit: http://www.peaceactio...

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Permaculture for Peace Benefit in Portland
